summary: Implements a pandas‑compatible ExtensionArray that stores each element as a fixed‑width byte string representing a set of bits, exposing the data as Python sets and providing vectorized set operations such as union, intersection, difference, and subset/superset checks across elements, slices, and boolean masks.
business_intent: Enable compact, high‑performance storage and manipulation of set data within pandas structures, allowing data scientists to perform efficient set arithmetic directly on DataFrame columns without resorting to slower Python‑level representations.
